title.text: Hey, I'm a digital product developer

hero.body: I’m Dheeraj a Web designer and Front-end developer, who loves crafting fast and easy to use web applications.

items.title: Branding & logo
items.body: Find the perfect name, design and logo to distinctly identify your business. We provide creative and fun ways to make your brand stand out.

items.title: Design
items.body: Get custom designed, tailor made high-quality websites. Whether you’re promoting your business, showcasing your work, opening your store or starting a blog — we can do it all.

items.title: Development
items.body: Get help and assistance in build super fast and reliable code base. Give you responsive design with accessibility in mind, with a clean, simple and scalable design.

items.title: SEO
items.body: Reach million through carefully added optimizations to your website. Master the art of ranking high on a search engine without any fuzz.

items.title: Cochincarrental.com
items.body: A sister concern of Series tours, Cochin car rental is one of the leading Kerala Tour Operators - engaged in the promotion of Kerala Tourism. They focus on providing customers with the best car rental and tour package they can enjoy inside of Kerala. With a fleet of trained drivers, highly maintained vehicles and exceptional customer service, they have become one of the best taxi services in Kerala.

items.title: Zealacademy.info
items.body: Zeal Academy is one of the emerging preeminent institution for pharmacy graduates who are aiming to build a healthcare career abroad. They are committed in nurturing dreams of becoming a part of healthcare foreign jobs with comprehensive education services. They are creating new, radical and certifying opportunities that helps students recognize the accurate path of accomplishment that helps as the springboard for their future career.

items.title: Camelcase.in
items.body: Camelcase is a team of developers who will help you build applications using advanced frameworks with minimal footprint. Ready to build using React, Angular, Ionic, Spring, Django, MongoDB or whatever you prefer.

items.title: Riceandricecalicut.com
items.body: Rice & Rice Calicut is acknowledged for providing high-quality rice making use of superior grade rice as inputs. With expert done selection of types of rices, they work with a team of deft professionals who manage the entire task proficiently and lay special emphasis on product packaging so as to ensure no damage till it reaches the end-user with affordable pricing.

title.text: Hi there, I'm a Web designer and Front-end developer who loves crafting fast and easy to use web applications.

about.body: I love design, web development and passionate about open source. A big believer in minimalism and elegant design, and doing more by doing less. I've worked as a Front end developer for 4+ years, designing and developing customizable data driven user interfaces for Healthcare, eCommerce, Product Quality analytics domain and more...

testimonials.name: Jithin Joseph
testimonials.message: He has exceptional knowledge in Frontend Development and he is an awesome teacher. A master at creating, minimalistic and creative solutions. We love working with him!

testimonials.name: Jijo Raju
testimonials.message: A talented React developer with enormous amount of passion and determination. He is very precise in performing his task as well as very responsive and helpful.
